title: Engagement Photo Props! ^-^
body: My fiance and I are going to be having a League of Legends accented wedding (tables named after champions, things like that!) and we just finished the props for our engagement photos next weekend!

replies.body:
I'm really happy for you and all, but I have to do this.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=R8cZUhiP3us
^-^ We've got a traditional wooden sign with our wedding date on it, too, but these are way more fun, I think!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=BMoN8M8a,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-01-20T03:11:00.856+0000)
>
> (tables named after champions, things like that!)

So Table 1 is now Table Thresh. "Where is this person at?? Oh, he's right over there at Table Thresh." lol

> [{quoted}](name=ChimeiTekinaNasu,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=BMoN8M8a,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2015-01-20T04:41:00.321+0000)
>
> So Table 1 is now Table Thresh. "Where is this person at?? Oh, he's right over there at Table Thresh." lol

You don't want Thresh at a wedding... he's got wifesteal.
{{champion:236}} {{item:3070}}
{{champion:412}}  XD

honestly all my upvote belong to katey here and she deserves all the happiness she finds in her life, ive only noticed her on the forums for little more than a month but she already becoming a staple in riot like iron stylus or xelnath, plus i think she posts here like 10 times more on it, probably is because people dont hassle her for the riot cookie stash like they do with near every other red.
Time to find a girl who likes league like I do

Since we're talking League. What about...

> I now pronounce you Feeder and Scrub
> 
> You may now AFK at fountain.


Or

> Dafaq dude. I called solo mid first. 
> 
> GG Report 2 midlaners!!!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=BMoN8M8a,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-01-20T03:11:00.856+0000)
>
> My fiance and I are going to be having a League of Legends accented wedding (tables named after champions, things like that!) and we just finished the props for our engagement photos next weekend!

please tell me debonair vi and debonair jayce are tieing the knot?
Happy wedding and don't let your kids play {{champion:17}}
wait... Is Hitler endorsing {{champion:17}} or saying that you should not play him?
leave it up to your opinion.
well then... I would say the answer is yes .__.
You should probably sweep the wedding location just in case {{champion:17}} shows up

I have to ask...

How on earth do you tell someone to sit at the Urgot table or any of the tables, really, without cracking up? I just feel like I'd never be able to go through with that if people didn't thoroughly understand league without busting a gut. 

Also, if the dishes you serve to each table aren't based on the champions abilities it's just not worth it, and I will be dissapoint.
Nice, I can't wait to attend :)
Congratulations! That is such a good idea :D
i hope it will be a f{{champion:22}}  wedding. also {{champion:112}} y!

Ha,WORTH.

Also......https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wDajqW561KM
Thanks, everyone! ^-^
Congratulation Katey! Those are awesome Props!
Congratulations! I hope you and your Fiance will have a wonderful wedding!

thats pretty cute.
I've been to a few high end weddings  in my life.
I'm not much of a "party" person but I do enjoy a really well made homemade dish.

If you've never had homemade carrot cake or apple pie..mmm
or home made chicken dumpling soup.
Oh mer gerd.
now I'm hungry.
greatttttttttttttt

Awww, I like this idea...


If one of you plays jungle you should have the quote:


 "When it gets rough... I'll be there with you."

{{champion:6}} wishes u a merry christmas or wedding
So much win! Congratulations Katey!

Congrats! :D 

This is so cool, and the seats better be Teemo shrooms. 

Will you be cosplaying for the wedding and more importantly, CAN WE WATCH IT?
just watch out for the thresh table, it is known to steal wifes (or is it wives?)
Jelly c':

That's adorable.

~~In before Darius attempts to stop the wedding only to be forced to duel Garen who was respectfully observing but by god it's GO TIME.~~

Don't get out {{summoner:11}}ed at the wedding lol
jk these are neat :P
AHH SO CUTE :3 A WEDDING!!!
I love the Victory sign. Congratulations on your engagedness! (Probably late, but meh)
the victory made me laugh
Its so cheesey but it warms my heart :){{champion:63}}
Congratulations!  Wish my fiance would let me do something fun like this.  Stupid traditional crap :(
